situation.title: Funerals
situation.meta_description: Funerals are allowed but only 10 people can be present.

content.processed:
Rules and recommendations

Funerals are allowed but only 10 people can be present. The general obligations to wear a mask follow hygienic regulations apply. As part of preventative measures, social distance (even when sitting).

The wake cannot be held in a restaurant or any other catering facilities. The general ban on the presence of the public in restaurants applies. After the ceremony, you can gather in your home. Please follow the rules related to free movement and hygienic regulations, even when consuming food or drink.

Funeral services are allowed to operate, the exemption from the ban on the provision of services applies specifically to funeral service establishments, the performance of embalming and conservation, incineration human remains or human remains and placing human remains in urns.

questions_answers.question: Is it possible to have live music at the funeral?
Is it possible to have a wake in a restaurant?
Can grandparents go to funerals?
questions_answers.value: Yes, but given the high risks of infection in at-risk groups, it is good to take it into consideration.

questions_answers.question: Do I have to wear a face mask during the mourning ceremony?
Can I go to the cemetery?
questions_answers.value: Yes, travel to and from the cemetery is exempt from the free movement of persons. But do not gather with other people and wear a face mask when in the cemetery.
